title: Documentation confusion configuring akka http in dev mode.
body:
I was looking to set some custom akka http settings (specifically, akka.http.parsing.max-uri-length) and wanted to test my configuration in dev mode.  

https://www.playframework.com/documentation/2.6.x/SettingsAkkaHttp has a note at the bottom about how the setting wouldn't be picked up in dev mode without some additional work, but the link about other options goes here: https://www.playframework.com/documentation/2.6.x/Configuration#Using-with-the-run-command when it was probably was intended to go here: https://www.playframework.com/documentation/2.6.x/ConfigFile#Using-with-the-run-command.  

I attempted to set 
```sbt
PlayKeys.devSettings := Seq(
  "akka.http.parsing.max-uri-length" -> "1m"
)
```
but this did not work.  Confusingly, this section of the same doc: https://www.playframework.com/documentation/2.6.x/ConfigFile#Using-with-Akka suggests that akka needs to be configured under `play.akka`, but I believe that hasn't been the case since before play 2.4.  

After browsing the dev startup code ([DevServerStart.scala](https://github.com/playframework/playframework/commit/bad893d6ad7bf6a92ef05ee2fd87297e62f44224#diff-58bf6474fbdd7970aeb1630b24c9f7e2R217)), I found that my attempt at overriding the default setting wasn't working because in dev mode akka configuration is pulled from `play.akka.dev-mode`.  As far as I can tell, this isn't documented anywhere outside of the code.  

So to set the max-uri-length such that it would be picked up in dev mode, I actually needed: 
```sbt
PlayKeys.devSettings := Seq(
  "play.akka.dev-mode.akka.http.parsing.max-uri-length" -> "1m"
)
```
If this is how it's going to be, it would be nice if it could be documented and if issues with the existing docs could be cleaned up to make it clearer.
